description:
When Daigo plays catch with Hikaru, he once again gets a feeling that they could form a battery.
However, at practice the next weekend, he`s shocked to find out that Hikaru has suddenly moved to his mother`s hometown in Gunma.
Disappointed in Hikaru for not even saying a word before leaving the Dolphins and transferring schools, Daigo lashes out at Mutsuko when she tries to talk to him.
Daigo refuses Toshiya`s special catcher training and holes up in his room.
There, he gets a visitor....
Source: crunchyroll
